name: eceq2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))

comment: Equality theorem for the ` A ` -coset and ` B ` -coset of ` C ` , deduction version. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 23-Apr-2021.)
